title: Level 5.5 - A Hidden Floor in Impel Down
description: Reveals the existence of Level 5.5 (New Kama Land), a secret level between Level 5 and Level 6 of Impel Down that has existed for over 100 years. It was created by a prisoner with the Push-Push Fruit and has secret passageways to every level above it.
significance: Demonstrates that even the World Government's most secure facility has massive blind spots. Shows that prisoners have been escaping Impel Down's detection for over a century, undermining the prison's reputation as inescapable.
worldImpact: Changes the understanding of Impel Down's security and reveals that the 'demoned away' prisoners were actually rescued by the New Kama Land community.

title: Army Wolves of Level 5
description: The Army Wolves are vicious predators that were moved from Level 2 to Level 5 because they were too dangerous - they hunted and ate the other guardian beasts including the Basilisk and Sphinx.
significance: Expands the understanding of Impel Down's security system and the dangerous creatures that guard different levels.
worldImpact: Shows the extreme measures Impel Down takes to prevent escapes, and the hierarchy of dangerous creatures within the prison.

title: Revolutionary Army Presence in Impel Down
description: Reveals that the Revolutionary Army has had a presence in Impel Down through Emporio Ivankov and Inazuma, who have been operating New Kama Land as a sanctuary.
significance: Shows the Revolutionary Army's reach and influence, operating a hidden base within the World Government's most secure prison.
worldImpact: Establishes that the Revolutionary Army has been undermining the World Government's prison system for years, harboring escaped prisoners.

title: Okama/Newkama Culture in One Piece
description: New Kama Land serves as a haven for the okama/newkama community, with its own culture, society, and support system. It's ruled by Emporio Ivankov, the 'Okama King' and former Queen of Kamabakka Kingdom.
significance: Expands the understanding of gender and sexuality in the One Piece world, showing diverse communities and identities.
worldImpact: Establishes the okama/newkama as an important cultural group in One Piece with their own kingdoms, leaders, and communities.

title: Conqueror's Haki Manifestation While Unconscious
description: Demonstrates that Conqueror's Haki can manifest even when the user is unconscious and severely weakened, triggered by emotional desperation and the will to protect others.
significance: Expands understanding of how Haki works, showing it's deeply connected to willpower and can activate instinctively.
worldImpact: Reinforces that Conqueror's Haki is an innate quality tied to a person's fundamental nature and willpower, not just a consciously controlled ability.
